subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The 47-year-old former heavyweight champion Evander Holyfield knocked out 41-year-old Frans Botha of South Africa with 2 minutes 5 seconds left in the eighth round Saturday night in Las Vegas.
snippet: The 47-year-old former heavyweight champion Evander Holyfield knocked out 41-year-old Frans Botha of South Africa with 2 minutes 5 seconds left in the eighth round Saturday night in Las Vegas.
